name: DeleteBoardTextItem
description:
Delete a text item from a Miro board.

Use this tool to delete a specific text item from a Miro board. This action requires 'boards:write' scope and adheres to level 3 rate limiting. Call this tool when you need to remove unwanted or outdated text entries from your board.

parameters.name: board_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the board from which the text item will be deleted.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the item.

parameters.name: text_item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the text item you want to delete from the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to delete.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the item.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the item.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to delete.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to delete.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
